name: Hardcore Arena
description:
HARDCORE ARENA is a 2D shooter action game with a top-down perspective. This is a submission for the GMTK 48 hours game jam.
Go floor by floor killing all enemies and winning points. These can be used to buy guns and attachments, but you can ONLY use ONE gun.
